answers.answer: I had it....but I only had to give birth at 38 weeks....I'm only 16 weeks with my second now wondering the same thing!!!

I had it with my first starting at 30 ish weeks and was induced at 39 weeks! I'm now 38 weeks with my second and I've only had a high blood pressure reading twice with no other sighs of preeclampsia! Everyone is different! Hopefully you guys are lucky like me and don't get it this time around

I had sever preeclampsia with my first had him via emergency c section at 36 weeks, I was luck enough to not have it with my second pregnancy, and I'm currently 30 weeks with my 3rd child and so far am doing great, and have my 3rd c section scheduled.

question: I had severe preeclampsia with my first baby and had to have a c section at 28 weeks.In pregnant with baby #2 now, 19 weeks already. Just wondering if there are any mom's out there with similar history. What's your experience been like?
title: Anyone with history of preeclamsia?
